courses.name: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
courses.description: A foundational course designed to launch your cloud journey. It covers the core concepts of cloud computing, Azure architecture, and services. Ideal for anyone new to Azure.
keyTopics: Cloud Concepts: High Availability, Scalability, Elasticity, Disaster Recovery, IaaS, PaaS, SaaS
Azure Architecture & Services: Regions, Availability Zones, Resource Groups, Compute (VMs, Containers), Networking (VNet, DNS), Storage, Databases
Management & Governance: Cost Management, Security (NSGs, Policy), Compliance

courses.name: Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals
courses.description: A comprehensive introduction to Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning on Azure. It bridges the gap between theory and practice, preparing learners for the AI-900 certification.
keyTopics: AI Workloads: ML, Computer Vision, Anomaly Detection, NLP, Responsible AI
Machine Learning on Azure: Regression, Classification, Clustering, Azure ML (Automated ML, Designer)
Computer Vision: Image Classification, Object Detection, Face Services
Natural Language Processing (NLP): Sentiment Analysis, Speech Recognition, Language Services
Generative AI: OpenAI Service, Prompt Engineering

courses.name: Microsoft Azure Administrator
courses.description: A critical course for professionals managing Azure environments. Covers daily administration tasks, identity management, and networking.
keyTopics: Identity & Governance: Azure AD (Entra ID), RBAC, Policy
Storage: Storage Accounts, File Shares, Blob Storage
Compute: VMs, Scaling, App Service, Containers
Networking: VNets, NSGs, Azure Firewall, DNS, Load Balancing
Monitoring: Azure Monitor, Backup/Recovery
outcomes: Deploy and manage Azure compute resources
modules: Deploy and Manage Azure Compute Resources
courses.experienceRequired: 6 months of hands-on Azure experience; knowledge of OS, virtualization, and networking

courses.name: Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure
courses.description: The definitive course for cloud developers. Focuses on coding, SDKs, and building scalable, secure applications using Azure services.
keyTopics: Compute Solutions: VMs, App Service, Azure Functions
Storage: Blob Storage, Cosmos DB
Security: Authentication (MSAL), Key Vault, Managed Identities
Monitoring & Optimization: Application Insights, Redis Cache, CDN
Messaging: Event Grid, Event Hubs, Service Bus
modules: Monitor, Troubleshoot, and Optimize Azure Solutions
Connect to and Consume Azure Services
courses.experienceRequired: 1-2 years of development experience; proficiency in a supported language (C#, Python, etc.)

courses.name: Designing and Implementing a Microsoft Azure AI Solution
courses.description: A hands-on course for designing and deploying AI solutions. Covers Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, and custom AI workflows.
keyTopics: Generative AI: RAG, Prompt Engineering, Fine-tuning, Content Filters
AI Agents: Azure AI Foundry Agent Service, Semantic Kernel
Natural Language: Text Analysis, Question Answering, Speech Recognition/Synthesis
Computer Vision: Image Analysis, Custom Vision, Face Detection
Information Extraction: Document Intelligence, Knowledge Mining (AI Search)
outcomes: Plan and manage Azure AI solutions
modules: Plan and Manage Azure AI Solution

courses.name: Designing Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Solutions
courses.description: An expert-level course for aspiring Azure Solutions Architects. Focuses on design decisions, trade-offs, and strategic planning for infrastructure.
keyTopics: Governance & Monitoring: Azure Policy, Blueprints, Azure AD, Azure Monitor
Data Storage: SQL/NoSQL selection, Data Integration, Redundancy
Business Continuity: HA/DR strategies, Backup, Site Recovery
Infrastructure: Networking, Compute (VMs, Containers), Migration strategies
outcomes: Design identity, governance, and monitoring solutions
Earn Azure Solutions Architect Expert certification
modules: Design Identity, Governance, and Monitoring Solutions
courses.experienceRequired: AZ-104 Certification and advanced IT operations experience

courses.name: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions
courses.description: Expert-level training for DevOps Engineers. Covers the entire lifecycle from planning to monitoring using Azure DevOps and GitHub.
keyTopics: SRE & Instrumentation: Monitoring strategies, Site Reliability Engineering
Source Control & CI/CD: Git branching, Azure Pipelines, GitHub Actions
Release Strategy: Deployment patterns (Blue-Green, Canary), Package Management
Infrastructure as Code (IaC): ARM Templates, Bicep, Terraform
Security: DevSecOps, Dependency Management
outcomes: Design and implement DevOps development processes
Earn Azure DevOps Engineer Expert certification
modules: Design and Implement Build and Release Pipelines

courses.name: Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals
courses.description: An introductory course to the world of cloud data services. It covers core data concepts, relational and non-relational data, and analytics workloads on Azure.
keyTopics: Core Data Concepts: Structured vs. Unstructured data, Batch vs. Streaming
Relational Data: Azure SQL Database, SQL Managed Instance, SQL VMs
Non-Relational Data: Cosmos DB, Blob Storage, File Storage
Analytics: Data Warehousing, Azure Synapse, Databricks, Power BI

courses.name: Foundations of Microsoft Copilot (AI-3018)
courses.description: A course designed to turn users into Copilot solution architects. It covers the architecture, extension, implementation, and management of Microsoft Copilot.
keyTopics: Architecture: LLMs, Microsoft Graph, Prompt Engineering
Extending Copilot: Plugins, Graph Connectors, Power Platform integration
Implementation & Management: Deployment strategy, Licensing, Security, Copilot Studio
outcomes: Build custom copilots with Copilot Studio
Extend Microsoft 365 Copilot with plugins and connectors
courses.experienceRequired: Understanding of Microsoft 365 services (Teams, SharePoint, Outlook)

courses.name: AI Agent Certification
courses.description: A guide to building autonomous AI agents using modern frameworks like Azure AI Foundry and Semantic Kernel.
keyTopics: Agent Concepts: Types of Agents, Evolution
Development: Azure AI Foundry, Semantic Kernel SDK
Design Patterns: Reflection, Tool Use, Planning, Multi-Agent, React
Frameworks: Microsoft Agent Framework
outcomes: Build AI agents with Azure AI Foundry
Implement design patterns for intelligent agents

courses.name: Develop Generative AI Solutions with Azure OpenAI Service
courses.description: Focuses on utilizing Azure AI Studio to build generative AI applications.
keyTopics: Azure AI Studio: Model Catalog, Prompt Flow
RAG: Retrieval Augmented Generation with custom data
Responsible AI: Content filters, evaluation
Fine-tuning: Customizing language models
outcomes: Build generative AI applications with Azure OpenAI
Implement RAG patterns with custom data
Fine-tune language models for specific use cases
courses.experienceRequired: Professionals with C# experience and Azure familiarity

courses.name: Develop AI Agents with Azure AI Foundry
courses.description: A learning path focused on creating and orchestrating AI agents using Azure AI Foundry and Semantic Kernel.
keyTopics: Agentic AI: Design patterns (Reflection, Tool Use)
Azure AI Foundry: Agent Service, Model Catalog
Semantic Kernel: Plugins, Planning, Multi-Agent orchestration
Integration: Connecting to APIs and external services
outcomes: Design and build autonomous AI agents
Use Semantic Kernel for agent orchestration
Integrate agents with external systems and APIs
modules: Agent Design Patterns (Reflection, Tool Use, Planning)

courses.name: Build Computer Vision Solutions with Azure AI Vision
courses.description: Intermediate course on designing and building computer vision solutions.
keyTopics: Image Analysis: Prebuilt models for classification and analysis
Custom Vision: Training custom models for object detection
Face Services: Detection and recognition
OCR: Reading text from images
GenAI: Vision-enabled generative AI applications
outcomes: Deploy face detection and recognition services
Extract text from images using OCR

courses.name: Build Natural Language Processing Solutions
courses.description: Hands-on course for building NLP solutions using Azure AI Language and Speech services.
keyTopics: Text Analysis: Sentiment, key phrases, entity recognition
Conversational AI: Question answering, Language Understanding (CLU)
Speech: Recognition and Synthesis
Translation: Text translation services
outcomes: Implement text analysis and sentiment detection
Implement entity recognition and key phrase extraction

courses.name: Develop AI Information Extraction Solutions
courses.description: Focuses on extracting structured data from documents using Azure Document Intelligence.
keyTopics: Document Intelligence: Prebuilt models (Forms, Receipts, ID) and Custom models
Knowledge Mining: Integration with Azure AI Search
Multimodal Analysis: Using Azure AI Content Understanding
outcomes: Extract data from documents using prebuilt models
modules: Knowledge Mining with Azure AI Search

courses.name: Microservices with Containers and AKS
courses.description: Focuses on Microservice architecture, Docker containerization, and orchestration with Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).
keyTopics: Docker: Architecture, Commands, Dockerfile, Container Registry (ACR)
Microservices: Architecture, API Gateway, Communication
AKS: Cluster deployment, YAML, Pod/Node scaling
Azure Integration: App Service, Functions (Serverless)

courses.name: AI-900 Certification (New 2026 Curriculum)
courses.description: The updated 2026 curriculum for AI-900, shifting focus to Microsoft Foundry, Generative AI, and AI Agents.
keyTopics: Microsoft Foundry: Unified AI platform for building and deploying
Generative AI & Agents: Modern workloads and automation
Core AI: ML, NLP, Speech, and Computer Vision within the context of Foundry
Information Extraction: Document intelligence
outcomes: Describe generative AI and AI agents
Explain modern AI workloads on Azure
Pass the updated AI-900 certification exam
targetRoles: Business Leaders seeking up-to-date AI literacy

products.name: Premium Membership
products.description: Unlimited access to all premium courses, live mentor sessions, Interview Kit, and career guidance.
features: Interview Kit with real interview questions

products.name: Azure & AI Interview Kit
products.description: Comprehensive interview preparation package with real questions, answers, and strategies.

learningPaths.name: Cloud Computing Beginner
learningPaths.description: Start your cloud journey from scratch

learningPaths.name: Azure Administrator
learningPaths.targetAudience: System administrators, IT operations, cloud engineers

learningPaths.name: Azure Developer
learningPaths.targetAudience: Software developers, application developers, DevOps engineers

learningPaths.name: Azure AI Engineer
learningPaths.description: Design and implement AI solutions on Azure
learningPaths.targetAudience: AI developers, data scientists, machine learning engineers

learningPaths.name: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
learningPaths.targetAudience: Solutions architects, technical architects, senior engineers

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate
Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
